This is a demonstration app for RateTheApp.

RateTheApp is a custom component made by Brightec for Android developers. It displays a rating bar and a title and provides customised behaviour depending on the rating selected.

The default behaviour for a low rating is to prompt the user to email the developer. The default behaviour for a high rating is to prompt the user to leave a rating on the Play Store and then hide itself.
The default appearance of RateTheApp, showing the default title, star colours and rating behaviour.
The appearance of RateTheApp can be customised to change the title text, title style and the star colours.\n\nThe source code for these examples can be found on the RateTheApp website.
A customised title with custom text and style.
